title: U.S. is now the ‘Bitcoin mining capital of the world:’ GEM Mining CEO - Yahoo Finance
content: U.S. is now the ‘Bitcoin mining capital of the world:’ GEM Mining CEO  Yahoo Finance
description: China made headlines in 2021 when it first banned all domestic cryptocurrency mining in June and then outlawed cryptocurrencies completely in September. GEM Mining CEO John Warren believes that the U.S. has been able to fill the vacuum left by the Chinese pullout of the crypto space.
